name: Dog Owner's Home Veterinary Handbook
product_description: The classic bestseller—expanded and updated The guide dog lovers have relied on for more than twenty-seven years, this handbook has been extensively revised to include the latest information on everything from canine healthcare to nutrition to holistic treatments. Dog Owner's Home Veterinary Handbook , Fourth Edition, is the definitive guide for every dog owner. It puts vital information at your fingertips, with: An index of signs and symptoms to help you find information fast Clearly written, step-by-step directions for handling common canine ailments and problems A chapter on emergencies that explains what to do immediately for shock, broken bones, burns, dehydration, heat stroke, poisoning, insect stings and bites, wounds, and more Hundreds of photos and drawings that illustrate what to look for and what to do to provide the best care for your dog A glossary of terms With this guide, you'll know when to rush your pet to the vet and when you can begin treatment at home. You'll communicate more effectively with your vet. You'll have the latest information on every aspect of your dog's medical care when you need it. This is the hands-on reference you'll trust again and again. Read more

name: Complete Pet Health & Wellness Tracker Log Book - Blue: Record Important Vet Visits Vaccines Dates For Your Pet Dog Cat
product_description: The Pet Health Log Book is an essential tool for pet owners who want to prioritize their furry friend's well-being and maintain a detailed record of their health journey. Designed to be a comprehensive guide, this log book offers a structured and organized format to keep track of vital information, veterinary visits, medications, and parasite protection. With its user-friendly layout and ample space for notes, this log book allows you to easily record and reference essential details about your pet's health. From vaccinations and medical conditions to grooming routines, behavioral observations, and parasite prevention, every aspect of your pet's care can be documented in one convenient place. Stay on top of your pet's health by noting down veterinary visits, including dates, examinations, and diagnoses. Keep track of vaccination records, ensuring your pet stays up to date with necessary immunizations, including rabies, distemper, parvovirus, and more, based on veterinarian-recommended schedules. The log book also provides dedicated sections to monitor parasite prevention measures for dogs and cats. Note the dates and details of flea and tick treatments, ensuring your pet is protected from these common pests. Keep track of heartworm prevention medication administration, vital for regions with mosquito-borne heartworm disease risks. Additionally, you can record deworming schedules for puppies and kittens, ensuring their intestinal health and protection against common parasites. The log book guides you on when to initiate deworming and subsequent treatments based on your pet's age and veterinarian recommendations. Not only does the Pet Health Log Book serve as a reference for your pet's medical history, but it also enables you to observe patterns or changes in behavior, training progress, and any concerns or questions you may have for your veterinarian. Whether you have a dog, cat, or another beloved companion, this log book is suitable for all species and breeds. Its durable and portable design ensures it can be easily carried to veterinary appointments, making it a valuable resource for both you and your veterinarian. Prioritize your pet's health and maintain a comprehensive record of their well-being, vaccinations, medications, and parasite protection with the Pet Health Log Book. Provide your furry friend with the care they deserve, and enjoy the peace of mind that comes with having all their essential health information at your fingertips. Read more
